field.label: Enable schedule
field.help: Enable automatic backup. This will add a cron job to the system.

field.label: Enable on config change
field.help: Enable automatic backup after each configuration change.

field.label: Repository password
field.help: Password used for backup encryption

field.label: Backup config.xml
field.help: Backup the /config/config.xml file.

field.label: Backup rrd
field.help: Backup the /conf/rrd.tgz file.

field.label: Backup DHCP leases
field.help: Backup the /config/dhcpleases.tgz file.

field.label: Enable forget
field.help: Remove snapshots from the repository

field.label: Enable prune
field.help: Remove unneeded data from the repository. Note: Prune is required to really remove data from repository after a "forget".)

field.label: Restic forget flags
field.help: See Removing snapshots according to a policy for details.

field.label: insecure tls
field.help: Skip TLS certificate verification when connecting to the repository (insecure)

field.label: no cache
field.help: Do not use a local cache

field.label: cache dir
field.help: Set the cache directory. (default: use system default cache directory)

field.label: cleanup cache
field.help: Auto remove old cache directories

field.label: compression
field.help: Compression mode (default auto)

field.label: http user agent
field.help: Set a http user agent for outgoing http requests

field.label: retry lock
field.help: Retry to lock the repository if it is already locked, takes a value like 5m or 2h (default: no retries)

field.label: no extra verify
field.help: Skip additional verification of data before upload

field.label: limit download
field.help: Limits download to a maximum rate in KiB/s. (default: unlimited)

field.label: limit upload
field.help: Limits uploads to a maximum rate in KiB/s. (default: unlimited)

field.label: stuck request timeout
field.help: Duration after which to retry stuck requests (default 5m0s)
